jspecview.util
Class TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter

java.lang.Object
  jspecview.util.TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter

public class TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter
extends java.lang.Object

class TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter converts a JDXSpectrum from Transmittance to Absorbance and vice versa.

Author:
Debbie-Ann Facey, Khari A. Bryan, Prof Robert J. Lancashire

TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter

public TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter()
Method Detail

convert

public static JDXSpectrum convert(JDXSpectrum spectrum)
Converts and returns a converted spectrum. If original was Absorbance then a Transmittance spectrum is returned and vice versa or null if spectrum was neither Absorbance nor Transmittance then null is returned

Parameters:
spectrum - the JDXSpectrum
Returns:
the converted spectrum
